title: Pipe Spring National Monument: Alkali Sacaton
body: Alkali Sacaton        Alkali Sacaton NPS   Â    Alkali Sacaton is a perennial bunchgrass 20 to 60 inches tall Flowering occurs from May to October. Seed clusters have a branching pyramidal shape. This grass can be found at elevations from 1500 to 7500 feet.
